def_cn: 主持(仪式)；行使(指定的职务)
def_en: When someone officiates at a ceremony or formal occasion, they are in charge and perform the official part of it.

def_cn: （在体育比赛、竞赛等中）担任裁判
def_en: When someone officiates at a sports match or competition, they are in charge and make sure the players do not break the rules.
